item.title: Python In A Hurry
item.description: Python Reference List List items are ordered, changeable, and allow duplicate values. Ordered When we say that lists are ordered, it means that the items have a defined order, and that order will not change. If you add new items to a list, the new items will be placed at the end of the list. Changeable The list is changeable, meaning that we can change, add, and remove items in a list after it has been created.
